string.PhoneDescr: Enter your Telegram phone number to connect your account.
string.CodeDescr: Enter the 5-digit code you received on your Telegram account.
string.TelegramIntegrationDesc2: This feature is independent of regular Telegram notifications
string.ToSetupNotification: To set up regular Telegram notifications:
string.ConfigDescription: Extension to read and write Telegram messages
string.ConnectBotInfoStart: To start interacting with our bot, simply open
string.ConnectBotError: Looks like a connection could’t be automatically established. Please try reconnecting the bot by clicking “Start”.
string.BotDescription: With this bot you can get all notifications and reply to them without leaving Telegram.
string.BotShortDescription: With this bot you can get all notifications and reply to them without leaving Telegram
string.WelcomeMessage: Welcome! I am a bot that will help you to get all {app} notifications and reply to them without leaving Telegram.
string.TestMessage: Your {app} account is connected. You will receive your notifications.
string.ConnectMessage:
⚠️Please connect me to your {app} account.
Send /connect to generate code and paste it in {app} settings.
Code valid for {minutes} minutes.
string.StopMessage: You will no longer receive notifications about {app} events. If you want to turn them back on, just send /start.
string.AccountConnectedHtml: You have been successfully connected as {name}
string.SomethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
string.DisconnectMessage: ⚠️You have been disconnected from the service. Please reconnect your account on {app} using /{command}.
string.TryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search query or
string.EnableSyncToConfigure: Enable synchronization to configure channel access
string.AccessCannotBeChanged: Access cannot be changed for existing channel
string.IncorrectPhoneOrCode: Failed to connect Telegram account, please check that the phone number and code are entered correctly
string.UnknownError: An unknown error occurred in the Telegram service
